pageContext.claim: “The farmers are doing better than if China, frankly, were buying.”
pageContext.analysis: Numerous news reports have documented how the trade war has left farmers angry and frustrated, especially because the payments do not appear fairly distributed. "The widely varying payouts in the second round have confused and irritated farmers nationwide," according to Reuters interviews with more than three dozen growers. "Farmers also complained of software problems and poor training of local USDA employees, who have struggled to process applications and payments, farmers and government workers said."
